mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO `oe_line_apply` ( id, user_id, create_time, update_time, real_name, sex, mobile, wechat_no, course_id, anchor_id ) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.realName}, #{item.sex}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.wechatNo}, #{item.courseId}, #{item.anchorId})
